name: BonkMeet
description: A self hosted telegram bot for attending Google Meet sessions on bahalf of you.

bot_token.description: Get your bot's token from https://telegram.me/BotFather

user_id.description: Get your Telegram userID from https://telegram.me/userinfobot (@userinfobot)

threshold.description: Automatically leaves the meet when the meet strength becomes less then threshold strength.
